rules.description: Page Down => double Space (all files save, neovim)
Non Us Backslash to CMD + SHIFT + C (Firefox developer tools inspect)
Tada68 specific mappings for apple magic keyboard
End to spacebar, Delete to Ctrl + B
a- mode for navigation h j k l
r-mode for deleting characters with ui, words with jk and lines with hl
e-mode allows for easy back and forth one character, word or line
w-mode = e-mode + SHIFT (i.e. selection, not just movement)
q-mode for general shortcuts like browser tab navigation
v-mode for window management with Spectacle
